name: Panty Party Perfect Body
overview: As the Warrior of Love, players are the only hope for a human race to be transformed into panties with a vengeance! Experience this action-comedy full of panties, love, and passion - with epic battles between underwear! Fight for what you love on your path to becoming a true panty pro! In this world, panties are as deadly as they are alluring. Take the time to hone your skills using a variety of characters and abilities. Striped panties, lace panties, elegant and even mystical panties.
